Title: Extends certain provisions relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative
Summary: Extends certain provisions relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative from March 31, 2022 to March 31, 2024.
LawCode: Amd Part Q ยง2, Chap 59 of 2016
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part Q of chapter 59 of the laws of 2016, amending the mental hygiene law relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
